q: Would you like to play a game so retro it will hurt your eyes?

yes.q: Start. You are racing in your car, a red light comes up. Will you brake?

no.q: You won the race. It was your 9th victory. How many more do you need to have 10 victories?

answers.1: congratulations, you won the race and showed your math skills!

answers.no: Remember, the most powerful graphics chip is your brain!
